result.execSummary:
All charges against Sofia Encarnacion-Hernandez in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Sofia Encarnacion-Hernandez is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sofia Encarnacion-Hernandez

records.addlTxt:
Notice of Completion of Representation
Submitted by Atty Benjamin Schwarz

Case 22CF726 is Dismissed.
Ord Cit for Battery and Ord Cit for Disorderly Conduct issued.
Guilty Plea.  Found guilty. Fine of $200.50 per citation due in 60 days or civil judgment.
NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Emily K. Gaertner in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Benjamin L Schwarz in court for Sofia Encarnacion-Hernandez. Clerk. M.Burke. Plea agreement filed off record.

State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman. Attorney Benjamin L Schwarz in court with Defendant Sofia Encarnacion-Hernandez. Interpreter Leo Martin in court.  Clerk: PU
  Minutes:  Interpreter Martin is sworn in.  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

01:34 PM    Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Benjamin Schwarz.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 08:30 am..   Cash bond posted and continued w/ same conditions (see previous bond entry). rb
